title: Revell/Monogram '58 Corvette Roadster Plastic Model Kit (1/25 Scale)
features: Their combination of performance and elegance makes every generation timeless
Among the most notable of these mods were hood louvers and trunk lids spears, changes only found on the 1958
Kit features separate frame, opening trunk lid, multi-position front wheels and detailed V-8 with choice of fuel injection or carburetors
description: Overview: Skill Level 3, Scale: 1/25, Parts: 149. Other sporty two-seaters have come and gone, but Corvettes have made American hearts thump for decades.
